languages.text: "Совет недурен, и я принимаю его с благодарностью, инквизитор". {n}Ульфар изображает на лице почтение, но оно плохо скрывает неприязненную гримасу.{/n}
"It is a fine suggestion, which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The expression of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his antipathy.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Совет недурен, и я принимаю его с благодарностью, инквизитор". {n}Ульфар изображает на лице почтение, но оно плохо скрывает неприязненную гримасу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It's a fine recommendation which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The display of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his grimace of antipathy.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这确实是个很好的建议，我很感激，大审判官。”{n}乌尔法脸上恭敬的表情无法掩盖他声音中的冷漠。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is a fine suggestion, which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The expression of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his antipathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这确实是个很好的建议，我很感激，审判长。”{n}乌尔法脸上恭敬的表情无法掩盖他声音中的冷漠。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「素晴らしい提案だ。喜んでお受けしよう、異端審問官」{n}ウルファーの顔には敬意が表れていたが、反感の表情を隠すには不十分だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is a fine suggestion, which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The expression of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his antipathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい提案だ。喜んでお受けしよう、異端審問官」{n}ウルファーの顔には敬意が表れていたが、反感の表情を隠すには不十分だった。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Es una buena sugerencia que acepto con agradecimiento, Inquisidor». {n}La expresión de respeto en el rostro de Ulfar no logra ocultar su antipatía.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is a fine suggestion, which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The expression of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his antipathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es una buena recomendación que acepto con agradecimiento, Inquisidor». {n}La muestra de respeto en el rostro de Ulfar no logra ocultar su antipatía.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ein guter Vorschlag, den ich dankbar annehme, Inquisitor." {n}So sehr Ulfar sich auch bemüht, respektvoll zu wirken, er kann seine Antipathie nicht verbergen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is a fine suggestion, which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The expression of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his antipathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein guter Vorschlag, den ich dankbar annehme, Inquisitor." {n}So sehr Ulfar sich auch bemüht, respektvoll zu wirken, die Grimasse der Antipathie auf seinem Gesicht kann er nicht verbergen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Excellente suggestion, inquisiteur. Je vous remercie. » {n}L'antipathie manifeste d'Ulfar éclipse totalement son expression empreinte de respect.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is a fine suggestion, which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The expression of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his antipathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Excellente suggestion, inquisiteur. Je vous remercie. » {n}La grimace d'antipathie d'Ulfar éclipse totalement sa démonstration de respect.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Âlâ bir teklif, seve seve kabul ederim." {n}Ulfar'ın yüzündeki saygı ifadesi, antipatisini gizlemekte başarısız oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is a fine suggestion, which I accept gratefully, Inquisitor." {n}The expression of respect on Ulfar's face does a poor job of hiding his antipathy.{/n}
